ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 8 years. Currently this candidate is employed as an UNIX Administrator at Jackson National Life. This candidate has extensive knowledge of Linux, AIX UNIX, Linux Red Hat, Apache WEB Server, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, Domain Name Server Protocol, HACMP, IBM Hardware, Oracle, Network File System, Dynamic Host Control protocol, VMware, Jboss, Oracle 9i, IBM WebSphere, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, Veritas NetBackup, TCP/IP, Secure Socket Layer, Perl Programming, IBM RS6000 Hardware, HTTP, UNIX, Sun Solaris, FTP, Compaq/Digital Hardware, Veritas Volume Manager, Secure Shell, SMTP, SAN, Microsoft Internet Information Server, IBM Hardware > IBM pSeries, HP Hardware, DB2, CentOS, shell scripting, Solstice DiskSuite, Oracle 10G, Network Attached Storage, MySQL, Microsoft SQL Server, Linux Suse, LDAP, Java, IBM WebSphere Application Server, BIND, Active Directory, Veritas Cluster, SUN Hardware > Sun Enterprise Servers, SQL Server Reporting Services, Retail Performance Manager, Reporting Services, RDBMS, PostgreSQL, POP, PC Hardware, Oracle Real Application Clusters, Microsoft SQL Server 7.0, Linux Debian, ITIL, IMAP, IBM Mainframe Hardware, IBM Hardware > IBM xSeries, Data Centre, C Programming Language, BMC Software, XML, WordPress, Web Services, Veritas, VPN, Ubuntu 12.04, Tivoli/TME, Software RAID, Samba, SUN Hardware, SQL, Red Hat Linux OS, RAID, PURESCALE, Oracle DBA, Oracle Applications, Oracle 10g Application Server, Network Management, Netscape Navigator, Nessus, Navision, NIDS, MySQL Workbench, MongoDB, Migration, Microsoft Visual C/C++, Microsoft SQL Server 2008, Microsoft SQL Server 2005, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, Microsoft Great Plains Dynamics, MC, LAMP, Java Servlets, Java RMI, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, JBoss Java EE application server, IPX, IBM Hardware > IBM Blade Server, Hitachi Disk Array, Enterprise Java Beans, ERP Tools, DotProject, Dell Server Hardware, Data Migration, Client/Server, CentOS AIX, Bugzilla, Bash, Agile Methodology, Agent, ARP. So far this candidate has not gained any managerial experience.
